synopsis:
The theme is "one continues to live, leaving his trace." It is an abstract animation which movement is done by repetition of pencil drawings and erasure on a piece of paper.

 1st year work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director: Saki Nakano
Sound Desgin: Yasutake HIRAI
Producer: Koji YAMAMURA

(Source: Tokyo University of the Arts)
